about:
Hi! I'm Hong. Welcome to my website! 

 I'm passionate about understanding our world from a broad perspective, which translates to interests in large-scale systems, history, sociology, literature, languages, writing and cooking. 

 I grew up in Singapore learning about the humanities and music, studied computer science and logic at college (where this photo is from) and currently work in Seattle. 

 I'm a member of the Unicode Consortium, Singapore's Infantry reserve and the Strangers United soccer club.
